ygData.subject: Velishoul's Tomb
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, BACK to the game now... First off, thanks to you guys I ve accomplished my first Research of a spell and have successfully created a Levitate Spell. Thanks
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, BACK to the game now...

First off, thanks to you guys I've accomplished my first Research of a spell
and have successfully created a Levitate Spell. Thanks for all the info!

Now, i've come across another type of page and am curious on what to do with
it. Rather than being a part of a page like the Grimiore, this is a full
page Entitled Velishoul's Tombe Page 68.. Just like Tasarin's page it cannot
be read like normal documents.

I got this page from a trade with another player for a rune I had found, so
I am unaware of it's source.

Also, anyone notice an abundance of left sided portions of grimiore pages? I
rarely find the right side portion. Is it just my bad luck to always find
the left side (I have 8 of them), or is the right side the rarer side?
